snippet: Lionel Messi’s girlfriend, Antonella Roccuzzo, gave birth to a baby boy named Thiago.
abstract: Antonella Roccuzzo, girlfriend of Barcelona soccer star Lionel Messi, gives birth to a baby boy named Thiago.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi’s girlfriend, Antonella Roccuzzo, gave birth to a baby boy named Thiago.
